answers.answer: Constipation is serious.  Toxins can back up into your body.  Slippery elm helps slide things along, along with fresh fruits/vegetables.  Also, you might start taking vitamins/minerals to keep your body in balance.  Psyllium husk is all natural and cleans as it moves through...probiotics put good flora in your colon.  Whatever you do, don't give up until something works.  Grapes/apples are also good.
I have heard that apples and prunes work well for constipation. I am not sure what else to try, I always eat fresh fruits and it keeps me pretty regular. Hope you get well soon.

You need to be talking to your doctor about this!  Maybe they can put you on some kind of special diet or just keep trying different meds till one works.  Constipation and not going to the bathroom can have severe consequences on your body.  Definitely share these concerns with your doctorl.

HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!To treat constipation you have to find the cause. Chronic constipation can be due to diet poor in roughage or fiber and also due to dehydration. A high roughage with low water too could be a cause.  Diabetes and hypothyroidism, colon disorders, irritable bowel syndrome, diverticular diseases, cancers, severe acidity etc can all cause constipation. It can also be due to milk allergy and other food allergies.A proper investigation is required preferably by a gastroenterologist (a doctor who looks after the digestive system) to know what is the cause. The treatment will follow correct diagnosis. Hope this helps. Take care!

title: Constipated and Scared
